style_guide.key_principle: Backgrounds should not compete with pixel art monsters

workflow.step_1: Capture photos of 6 UGM locations (one per rank)
workflow.step_2: Upload each photo to ChatGPT Plus (DALL-E 3 access required)
workflow.step_5: Crop/resize to 1920x1080 using Photopea or Canva
workflow.step_6: Adjust colors if needed to match game palette
workflow.step_7: Optimize with TinyPNG or convert to WebP with Squoosh
workflow.step_9: Update page.tsx to integrate backgrounds (see README.md)

integration_code.get_current_background: const currentRank = getCurrentRank(gameState.harmony); const bgImage = RANK_BACKGROUNDS[currentRank.level - 1];

fallback_option.if_photo_transform_fails: Generate without photo upload using prompt: 'Create a soft watercolor painting of [description of rank atmosphere], Indonesian university campus aesthetic, [colors], [mood], horizontal game background 16:9, dreamy painterly style for mental health game'
fallback_option.example: For Rank 3: 'Create a soft watercolor painting of peaceful campus garden with tropical trees and blue sky, Indonesian university aesthetic, soft blues and greens, calm balanced mood, horizontal game background 16:9, serene dreamy style for mental health wellness game'

notes.cultural_authenticity: Using real UGM locations creates emotional connection for target users
notes.performance: Optimize all backgrounds to under 200KB for fast loading
notes.progressive_enhancement: Load low-res placeholder first, then high-res with lazy loading
